title: Service charge by restaurants, hotels with GST a 'double whammy' for customers: Delhi High Court
description: Delhi High Court criticizes service charge with GST, questioning renaming to 'staff charges' by restaurant associations. Case involves Consumer Protection Authority's guidelines on transparent service charge display, next hearing on May 29.
